it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.client

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.client.ClientController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputObserver

    public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputObserver
    This class represents the client controller that takes care of sending through the network all the commands requested by the player.
    Author:
    Jimmy
